assessments.status_rationale: No verified report on CME Henry Hub NG front-month settling at or below $2.50; today's news contains no hard commodity settlement data.

No China NBS Manufacturing PMI print is reported; the October reading is expected around month-end and is absent from the bullets.
No AAA daily national gasoline price level is provided; cannot confirm a print at or below $3.40.
No USD/MXN quotation is included; no confirmation of trading at or above 19.00.
IBM Q3 2025 revenue growth is not referenced; without the company’s earnings release details, the outcome remains unknown.

No explicit U.S. initial jobless claims 4-week average level is mentioned; cannot verify reaching 230,000 or higher.
